turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Yeah, I'd like to order a latte from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not with cream, please. But can you add vanilla syrup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, so your order is: a grande latte with whole milk with vanilla syrup, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks on Broadway in Oakland, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks on broadway in oakland.
